dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Text in French on verso; signature A; catchword l'or. From : Le theatre du monde ... [Amsterdam : W. Blaeu, 1645?] State 5, 1645+, according to Burden; newly engraved sea around embellishments, especially in area found within 10⁰ and 20⁰ S, 240⁰ and 250⁰ longitude, showing many horizontal lines lacking any waves. Includes ill., text, and inset of Greenland area. Historic Maps copy 2 mounted on cardboard, with loss of text on verso.
